mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_CODE as itemCode, ITEM_NAME as itemName, CLOSING_PRICE as closingPrice, START_PRICE as startPrice, HIGH_PRICE as highPrice, LOW_PRICE as lowPrice, TRADE_VOLUME as tradeVolume, TRADE_MONEY as tradeMoney, DEAL_DATE as dealDate, TOTAL_AMOUNT as totalAmount, KOSPI_KOSDAQ as kospiKosdaq FROM DEAL_HISTORY WHERE 1=1 AND ITEM_NAME = #{companyName} AND DEAL_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT DEAL_DATE as dealDate FROM DEAL_HISTORY WHERE 1=1 AND ITEM_NAME = #{companyName} LIMIT 1
SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM COMPANY WHERE 1=1 AND ITEM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%') LIMIT 5
